title: A Torn Page, Spring 2012 Anthology
description: Empirical magazine presents its inaugural fiction anthology, highlighting writers from across the country. Featured writers include: Michael McGarr, Nick Hanson, Kenneth Weene, Cheyanne Pogue, LD White, Larry Kostroff, Kyle Owens, Philip Kobylarz, Thor Benson, Sam Goldsmith, Meg Stivison, Robert Dart, Joel Buckle, Sam Mansourou, Shannon Ketting, Carl Conrad, Mike Bagwell, Christopher Thompson, Joe Abbott, Kristy Webster, Dan O'Brien, and Alec Houze.
author: Dan O'Brian
